title: Any item cannot be selected initially in the library outline view
description:
Description: When trying to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, it is not possible to do so. The focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.
3. [Add additional step(s) here if needed.]
OB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, the focus is immediately directed to the library file node instead.
SR:
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Try to select any item in the library outline view.
3. [Add additional step(s) here if needed.]
